title: VSO ConvertXtoDVD 5.2.0.58 Final - Multilang
description:
ConvertXtoDVD, video conversion software, you can convert and burn all your videos and convert Avi to DVD! Backup and transfer your movies to DVD and enjoy watching them on any home DVD player. All in one conversion and burning software. This award-winning divx to dvd video converter software supports most video and audio formats for video conversion (avi, mpg, mov, wmv, mkv, ogm and more) and even handles DVD to DVD copy! Backup and transfer your movies to DVD and enjoy watching them on any home DVD player.

What's new:
- 0009484: [Bug] menu font changes conflict - changes not always taken into account (felicia) - resolved.
- 0009479: [Bug] DVD structure not interpreted the same as in VLC (felicia) - resolved.
- 0009475: [Bug] drive selected for burning is not the drive selected in default settings (cedric) - resolved.
- 0009471: [Bug] hard to do cut sections when working with long video files (felicia) - resolved.
- 0009458: [Bug] some flvs not loading (cedric) - resolved.
- 0009453: [Bug] Changing the font size is still ignored if changed in Default Settings -> Menu options -> Edit current template fonts (felicia) - resolved.
- 0009446: [Bug] menu template "no menu" does not exisit (cedric) - resolved.
- 0009447: [Bug] Aluminium theme output tab is all black again (cedric) - resolved.
- 0009448: [Bug] while encoding and dragging software interface it becomes transparent and encoding process paused (cedric) - resolved.

Home Page www.vso-software.fr
Interface: Ml
